sentences.english: Mr Wakshlag describes it as "a hit-saving machine".
sentences.chinese: 瓦克施萊格先生形容它爲一部“熱播回放機”。

sentences.english: Wanting to do him dirt, she sent his wife a poison-pen letter.
sentences.chinese: 施詭計就寫了一封惡意中傷的信給他的妻子。

sentences.english: Want to manure the whole place over, scabby soil.
sentences.chinese: 這片土壤太貧瘠了，想整個兒施一通肥。

sentences.english: Finally in order to tap playing technique applied to affected part and the end of the treatment.
sentences.chinese: 最後以輕叩打手法施於患處而結束治療。

sentences.english: Sulphur powder has no remarkable effect on soil nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 施硫磺粉對土壤養分沒有明顯的影響。

sentences.english: Compound Iron Fertilizers had significant effects on rectifying peanuts chlorosis caused by iron deficiency.
sentences.chinese: 復混鐵肥土施矯治石灰性土壤花生缺鐵黃化效果顯著。

sentences.english: Experimental study on the nitrogen of total nitrogen content of soybean.
sentences.chinese: 實驗研究了施氮對大豆全氮含量的影響。

sentences.english: Guan Tang Shi Cao said the Chinese opera, literature, classical masterpieces hanging.
sentences.chinese: 關湯戲曲施曹說，文學傑作垂古典。

sentences.english: The priest always christens his own child first.
sentences.chinese: 牧師總是先爲自己的孩子施洗禮。

sentences.english: Sandier soils will require lighter and more frequent fertilizations and slightly heavier yearly rates.
sentences.chinese: 沙性大的土壤需要少量多施，以後逐年加大用量。

sentences.english: That boy who is walking along with your daughter is my son Harish .
sentences.chinese: 與您女兒一起走的男孩是我的兒子，哈利施。

sentences.english: Organic manure should be first applied to wheat to let maize use the residual nutrients .
sentences.chinese: 有機肥應首先施於小麥使玉米利用養分殘效。

sentences.english: As for glass wool insulation layer, the construction workers will create fiber body itching.
sentences.chinese: 如保溫層爲玻璃棉，施工時纖維會造成工人身體痕癢。

sentences.english: We definitely do not apply a policy of benevolence to the reactionaries.
sentences.chinese: 我們對反動派決不施仁政。

sentences.english: Wear rubber or latex gloves when using.
sentences.chinese: 施工時請使用橡膠或乳膠手套。

sentences.english: The patrol car was passing the crossing beside the She-Tzuo-Liao flag station.
sentences.chinese: 巡道車正要通過施厝寮旗站旁的平交道。
